channel.title: Ah WTF?!? Trying to play on my own server
channel.description:
I'm a total noob when it comes to hosting a server. I've read many guides(5+) on how to make your own server to play on.
Basically I need something to play when I don't have internet (which is very often). I've downloaded various clients and sources and gone step by step through guides and still cannot get anything accomplished. Many of the guides I've went through vary in methods and none of them have worked for me. If you are knowledgeable with this please PM, email, or reply here with a simple but step by step tutorial. I'm trying to learn some coding and just have something to do in my spare time without internet, not actually hosting a server for people to play on.
If you can't help with that, what is a good source and client to play? I just need something that is a little bit premade that I can mess around on.

4: Stab Att Boost

6: Crush Att Boost
7: Magic Att Boost
8: Range Att Boost
9: Stab Def Boost
10: Slash Def Boost
11: Crush Def Boost
12: Magic Def Boost
13: Range Def Boost
14: Strength Boost
15: Prayer Boost

I think…

item.title: Ah WTF?!? Trying to play on my own server
item.dc:creator: @HotDogs1 HotDogs1
item.description:
@HotDogs1 wrote:

If Your Using A 317 Go into gui.java And Search ip And set to 127.0.0.1
If your using 508 go into Applet_sub1 And set ip to 127.0.0.1

Read full topic

Once I have a compatible source and client downloaded what do I need to do?[/quote]
Login
